snippet: Wendy R. Sherman, an American under secretary of state, met with Prime Minister Baburam Bhattarai to express concern over Nepal’s treatment of Tibetan refugees.
abstract: Wendy R Sherman, American under secretary of state, meets with Nepal's Prime Minister Baburam Bhattarai to express concern over nation’s treatment of Tibetan refugees.
lead_paragraph: Wendy R. Sherman, an American under secretary of state, met with Prime Minister Baburam Bhattarai to express concern over Nepal’s treatment of Tibetan refugees.

headline.main: Nepal: A U.S. Appeal for Tibetan Exiles
headline.print_headline: Nepal: A U.S. Appeal for Tibetan Exiles
